title: Antonio Brown feuds with Eric Weddle on Twitter
text:
Antonio Brown may be out of the NFL, but that hasn’t stopped him from feuding with the people in it.

The unemployed wide receiver got into a Twitter exchange Thursday with Rams safety Eric Weddle — calling him a “Jabroni.” Brown appeared upset after Weddle had tweeted about him initially.

Hahahahhaahaha. AB. When are u gonna learn that it isnt about you. Never was and never will be. Got a game to get ready for. Good luck my guy! — Eric Weddle (@weddlesbeard) September 26, 2019

Keep you luck duck ; listen to your team stay focus on your opponent not AB ! AB is the brand not the individual! Clearly An AB fan ! Even know about education oh realllyyy https://t.co/rP8tVxCWsP — AB (@AB84) September 26, 2019

Brown said he was “done” with the NFL on Sunday, days after being released from the New England Patriots. But on Thursday, the Pro Bowler said the sport needs him like “I’m test answers.”

If Brown ever gets back into the NFL — a big if — it might be fair to say that the Rams won’t be a suitor.

I’m still the best why stop now — AB (@AB84) September 26, 2019

description: Antonio Brown may be out of the NFL, but that hasn't stopped him from feuding with the people in it.
